name: Ciri
ability:
Deploy: Damage 3 enemy units by 1.
When you lose a round, move self back to your hand.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage 3 enemy units by 1. When you lose a round, move self back to your hand.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.

name: Geralt: Igni
ability:
Deploy: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 40 or more power.
Initiative: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 25 or more power instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 40 or more power. Initiative: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 25 or more power instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
flavor: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.

name: Geralt of Rivia
ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.

name: Regis
ability:
Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
Initiative: If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 1. Initiative: If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
flavor: Some consider me a monster. A blood-crazed, savage monster.

name: Regis: Higher Vampire
ability: Order (Melee): Drain an enemy unit by the amount of boost it has.
ability_html: Order (Melee): Drain an enemy unit by the amount of boost it has.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Drain: Damage ignoring the target's armor, then boost self by the damage dealt.
flavor: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.

name: Triss Merigold
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy unit by its power.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy unit by its power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.

name: Villentretenmerth
ability:
Lineage.
Timer 3: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on the battlefield, excluding Dragons you control.
ability_html: Lineage. Timer 3: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on the battlefield, excluding Dragons you control.
keyword_html: Lineage: At the start of the game, boost self by the number of Dragons in your starting deck. Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability.
flavor: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.

name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2. 
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.

name: Zoltan: Scoundrel
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn and play Duda: Agitator.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Spawn and play Duda: Agitator. Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.

name: Ciri: Dash
ability: Timer 4: Draw a card.
ability_html: Timer 4: Draw a card.
keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability.
flavor: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.

name: Geralt: Aard
ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage 3 enemy units by 2, then move them to the Ranged row.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage 3 enemy units by 2, then move them to the Ranged row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.

name: Avallac'h: Sage
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play an artifact from your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Play an artifact from your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Amongst the free elves were a handful of Aen Saevherne, or Sages. They were an enigma, bordering on a legend.

name: Yennefer: Conjurer
ability:
Zeal. Order: Deal 1 damage to the highest-power enemy unit(s).
Cooldown: 1
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Deal 1 damage to the highest-power enemy unit(s). Cooldown: 1
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice… and when to conjure fire.

name: Dudu
ability: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
ability_html: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: A mimic, among the many other names for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings… or dopplers.

name: Eskel
ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…

name: Vesemir
ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.

name: Lambert
ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
ability_html: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.

name: Myrgtabrakke
ability:
Lineage.
Deploy: Draw a Dragon, then move a card from your hand to the bottom of your deck.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Charges: 0
At the start of the game, set the number of Charges to match your Lineage [0].
ability_html: Lineage. Deploy: Draw a Dragon, then move a card from your hand to the bottom of your deck. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Charges: 0 At the start of the game, set the number of Charges to match your Lineage [0].

Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.

name: Ocvist
ability:
Lineage.
Deploy: Spawn Cataclysm on the opposite row for 2 turns.
Timer 3: Damage all enemy units by 1.
ability_html: Lineage. Deploy: Spawn Cataclysm on the opposite row for 2 turns. Timer 3: Damage all enemy units by 1.
keyword_html: Lineage: At the start of the game, boost self by the number of Dragons in your starting deck. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row. Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability.
flavor: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.

name: Olgierd von Everec
ability:
Order: Heal self.
Cooldown: 1
ability_html: Order: Heal self. Cooldown: 1
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.

name: Operator
ability: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand on this row and the opposite row.
ability_html: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand on this row and the opposite row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.

name: Prize-Winning Cow
ability: Order: Transform into Chort.
ability_html: Order: Transform into Chort.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Mooooo.

name: Roach
ability: When you play a gold card, Summon self from your deck to a random allied row.
ability_html: When you play a gold card, Summon self from your deck to a random allied row.
keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: Geralt, we gotta have a man–to–horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.

name: Johnny
ability: Whenever you play a special card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
ability_html: Whenever you play a special card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
flavor: Life without savoring the sound of surreptitious shananacking is like licking snails through a cloth.

name: Sarah
ability: Whenever you play a special card, boost a random allied unit by 2.
ability_html: Whenever you play a special card, boost a random allied unit by 2.
flavor: Little Sarah wants to play!

name: Francis Bedlam
ability: At the end of your turn, boost the lowest-power unit in your hand by 1.
ability_html: At the end of your turn, boost the lowest-power unit in your hand by 1.
flavor: I might just discover I look great without ears… or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.

name: Cyprian Wiley
ability: Deploy: Banish a unit with power 4 or less.
ability_html: Deploy: Banish a unit with power 4 or less.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: Ever since his father died, he's become a real whoreson.

name: Iris von Everec
ability: At the end of your turn, if this card is in your graveyard, boost all units in your deck by 1, then Banish self.
ability_html: At the end of your turn, if this card is in your graveyard, boost all units in your deck by 1, then Banish self.
keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: I remember so little… Yet when I think of my rose, I begin to recall what was.

name: Unicorn
ability: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. If you control Chironex, boost it by 6 instead. If you have Chironex in your hand, also play it, then draw a card.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. If you control Chironex, boost it by 6 instead. If you have Chironex in your hand, also play it, then draw a card.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: They say unicorns are fond of virgins. Since finding a virgin these days is as hard as finding a unicorn, no one has been able to verify the theory.

name: Chironex
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3. If you control Unicorn, damage it by 6 instead. If you have Unicorn in your hand, also play it, then draw a card.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3. If you control Unicorn, damage it by 6 instead. If you have Unicorn in your hand, also play it, then draw a card.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Gods, that's no unicorn! That's…! – the last words of Vilemar, a famed collector of curiosities.

name: Duda: Companion
ability:
Doomed.
Boost all units on a row by 1.
ability_html: Doomed. Boost all units on a row by 1.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Knows one hundred words – eighty of them curses, the rest, connectors.

name: Duda: Agitator
ability:
Doomed.
Damage all units on a row by 1.
ability_html: Doomed. Damage all units on a row by 1.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Zoltan's parrot had the extraordinary ability to irritate anyone who spent time with it. Including Zoltan.

name: Ragh Nar Roog
ability:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a gold unit.
Prologue: Spawn Cataclysm on both enemy rows for 2 turns.
Chapter 1: Damage an enemy unit by 5.
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Clear Skies.
ability_html: Doomed. Scenario: Progress whenever you play a gold unit. Prologue: Spawn Cataclysm on both enemy rows for 2 turns. Chapter 1: Damage an enemy unit by 5. Chapter 2: Spawn and play Clear Skies.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row.
flavor: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.

name: The Last Wish
ability: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
ability_html: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.

name: Decoy
ability: Shuffle an allied unit on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
ability_html: Shuffle an allied unit on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
flavor: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.

name: Merigold's Hailstorm
ability: Damage 5 enemy units by 2.
ability_html: Damage 5 enemy units by 2.
flavor: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. Oh my, gasped Yennefer. We're about to make quite the mess, I think.

name: Skellige Storm
ability: Spawn Storm on an enemy row for 2 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Storm on an enemy row for 2 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
flavor: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.

name: Stammelford's Tremors
ability: Damage all enemy units by 1.
ability_html: Damage all enemy units by 1.
flavor: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.

name: Dimeritium Bomb
ability: Damage a unit by 4 and give it Veil.
ability_html: Damage a unit by 4 and give it Veil.
keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
flavor: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.

name: Blizzard
ability:
Destroy the lowest-power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all lowest-power units instead.
ability_html: Destroy the lowest-power unit. Initiative: Destroy all lowest-power units instead.
keyword_html: Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
flavor: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.

name: Commander's Horn
ability: Boost 5 adjacent units by 2. Boost bronze units by an additional 1 for each gold unit adjacent to them.
ability_html: Boost 5 adjacent units by 2. Boost bronze units by an additional 1 for each gold unit adjacent to them.
flavor: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.

name: Vaedermakar
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Increase all row effect durations by 1.
Deploy (Ranged): Decrease all row effect durations by 1.
If you control Scepter of Storms, increase or decrease the durations by 3 instead.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Increase all row effect durations by 1. Deploy (Ranged): Decrease all row effect durations by 1. If you control Scepter of Storms, increase or decrease the durations by 3 instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Vaedermakar druids control the elements. They soothe storms into silence, muster destructive hail, summon lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat them with utmost respect.

name: Alzur's Double-Cross
ability: Play the highest-power unit from your deck.
ability_html: Play the highest-power unit from your deck.
flavor: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.

name: Alzur's Thunder
ability: Damage a unit by 5.
ability_html: Damage a unit by 5.
flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.

name: Biting Frost
ability: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 3 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
flavor: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.

name: Clear Skies
ability: Boost all units on an allied row by 1.
ability_html: Boost all units on an allied row by 1.
flavor: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…

name: Impenetrable Fog
ability: Spawn Fog on an enemy row for 3 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Fog on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Fog: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the lowest power unit in this row by 2.
flavor: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.

name: Manticore Venom
ability: Damage 3 enemy units by 3.
ability_html: Damage 3 enemy units by 3.
flavor: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.

name: Adrenaline Rush
ability: Boost an allied unit by 8 if there are no other units on that row.
ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 8 if there are no other units on that row.
flavor: The beast rushed at them wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…

name: Epidemic
ability: Destroy a 4-provision cost unit.
ability_html: Destroy a 4-provision cost unit.
flavor: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.

name: Scorch
ability:
Destroy the highest-power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all highest-power units instead.
ability_html: Destroy the highest-power unit. Initiative: Destroy all highest-power units instead.
keyword_html: Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
flavor: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.

name: Swallow
ability: Boost a unit by 6.
ability_html: Boost a unit by 6.
flavor: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.

name: Thunderbolt
ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 3.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. Order: Boost an allied unit by 3.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: The witcher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.

name: Torrential Rain
ability: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 3 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
flavor: Even the rain in this land smells vile.

name: Bekker's Dark Mirror
ability: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
ability_html: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
flavor: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.

name: Renew
ability: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
ability_html: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Medicus curat, magicae sanat.

name: Dimeritium Shackles
ability: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
ability_html: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
flavor: The mage's arms were twisted and bound behind his back. The Redanians gave the fetters a good shake. Terranova cried out, lurched, bent backwards, bowed forward, then retched and groaned. It was clear of what his manacles were made.

name: Triss: Butterflies
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck, then draw a unit of your choice and boost it by 3.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck, then draw a unit of your choice and boost it by 3.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Cap'n… our arrows, they've… they've got wings!

name: Carlo Varese
ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each card in your hand.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each card in your hand.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: Everyone wantin' to trade in Novigrad's got a clear choice - agree terms with Cleaver or kiss their knees farewell.

name: Avallac'h
ability: Deploy: Spawn and play Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain.
ability_html: Deploy: Spawn and play Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: You humans have… unusual tastes.

name: Caretaker
ability:
Zeal. Order: Purify a unit.

Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Purify: Remove all statuses. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: There are more things in heaven and earth than all the world's philosophers have dreamt.

name: Colossal Ifrit
ability:
Zeal. Order: Damage 3 adjacent enemy units by [0]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game.
Cooldown: 3
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage 3 adjacent enemy units by [0]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game. Cooldown: 3
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.

name: Primordial D'ao
ability:
Shield.
Deploy: Boost self by [0]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game.
ability_html: Shield. Deploy: Boost self by [0]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game.
keyword_html: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

name: Gaunter O'Dimm
ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Doomed.
Order: Destroy a Doomed enemy unit.
ability_html: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Doomed. Order: Destroy a Doomed enemy unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.

name: Wolf Pack
ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each allied unit on this row.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each allied unit on this row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Relax, I know how to tame wolves…– Dunbar the Hunter's last words.

name: Enraged Ifrit
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by [5]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by [5]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: A certain mage thought them cute. It was his fate that gave rise to the saying Don't play with fire…

name: Frenzied D'ao
ability: Deploy: Play [1] Rock Barrage(s) from your deck. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game. If no Rock Barrages are available, move an enemy unit to the other row instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Play [1] Rock Barrage(s) from your deck. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game. If no Rock Barrages are available, move an enemy unit to the other row instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: They're easily mistaken for rocks. Many a troll's been unpleasantly surprised by gastric grief on that very account.

name: Wyvern Scale Shield
ability:
Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it a Shield.
While in your graveyard, when you play a unit, give it a Shield, then Banish self.
ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it a Shield. While in your graveyard, when you play a unit, give it a Shield, then Banish self.
keyword_html: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: Stronger than your average shield and far more stylish.

name: Elder Bear
ability: No ability.
ability_html: No ability.
flavor: We're going on a bear hunt! We're going to catch a–– THAT THING'S HUGE! RUN!

name: Lacerate
ability: Damage all units on a row by 2.
ability_html: Damage all units on a row by 2.
flavor: A sight more horrid you've never seen… The poor soul lay shredded as the beast lapped up its blood from the ground all around.

name: Petri's Philter
ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3.
Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
flavor: A mage responsible for dozens of brilliant inventions. The mind of a generation. Commonly referred to around the Continent as that bloke with the dish.

name: Korathi Heatwave
ability: Banish a unit or an artifact.
ability_html: Banish a unit or an artifact.
keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: Vicovaro scholars have determined that, in the absence of imperial aid, drought-stricken provinces lose half their population, two-thirds of their livestock and all their will to rebel.

name: Marching Orders
ability: Play the lowest-power unit from your deck.
ability_html: Play the lowest-power unit from your deck.
flavor: We are but pawns in a game played by old men, sent to fight and die on their senile whims…

name: Necromancy
ability: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
ability_html: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: We have ways of making you talk… alive or dead.

name: Summoning Circle
ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Look at the units in your deck in order from top to bottom, then choose a unit from your deck and set the Counter equal to that unit's provision cost.
Before the end of your turn, remove a Counter from self for each adjacent unit. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon the chosen unit from your deck to this row and destroy self.
ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Look at the units in your deck in order from top to bottom, then choose a unit from your deck and set the Counter equal to that unit's provision cost. Before the end of your turn, remove a Counter from self for each adjacent unit. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon the chosen unit from your deck to this row and destroy self.
keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: There exist a great many realities outside our own… With the right knowledge, one can contact them and summon beings beyond human fathoming.

name: Arachas Venom
ability:
Damage a unit by 3.
Deathblow: Also damage adjacent units by 3.
ability_html: Damage a unit by 3. Deathblow: Also damage adjacent units by 3.
keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
flavor: If substance makes contact with eyes, rinse immediately with cold water, then commence drawing up will.

name: Artefact Compression
ability: Lock a unit and reset its power.
ability_html: Lock a unit and reset its power.
keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
flavor: The figurine expanded in a flash, pulsing and throbbing, changing its shape and structure like a puff of smoke crawling over the floor. Beams of light revealed movement and hardening materials. A moment later, in the center of the magic circle a human form suddenly appeared.

name: Aguara: True Form
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a special card from any faction.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a special card from any faction.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: Ever heard of an anterion? Think of it as the opposite of a lycanthrope: a beast which can take on human form.

name: Uma's Curse
ability: Create and play a gold unit from any faction.
ability_html: Create and play a gold unit from any faction.
keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: I give you three solid leads, trails as fresh as morning dew, the aid of my spies and my court sorceress. Yet in my daughter's stead, you bring me this… monstrosity?

name: Aguara
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Lock a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Remove a unit's Lock.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Lock a unit. Deploy (Ranged): Remove a unit's Lock.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Smarten up right now, or it's off to an aguara with you!

name: Trial of the Grasses
ability: Set a unit's power to 13. If it's not a Witcher, damage it by 6 and Infuse it with the Witcher category first.
ability_html: Set a unit's power to 13. If it's not a Witcher, damage it by 6 and Infuse it with the Witcher category first.
keyword_html: Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
flavor: Imagine a lump of clay. In order to shape it, you must first moisten it or it will crumble. The Trial's initial part does just that. It opens the body to change, so to speak. Only then can the mutagens produce a witcher.

name: Hanmarvyn's Blue Dream
ability: Play a unit from your opponent's graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
ability_html: Play a unit from your opponent's graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: This spell lets you see the last moments of a dead man's life… if you can survive its casting.

name: Iris' Companions
ability: Deploy: Draw a card of your choice, then Discard a random card. If you have Iris in your hand, choose which card to Discard instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Draw a card of your choice, then Discard a random card. If you have Iris in your hand, choose which card to Discard instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
flavor: We'd rather keep our names to ourselves. Think of us as… friends of the house.

name: Dorregaray of Vole
ability: Deploy: Lock a unit.
ability_html: Deploy: Lock a unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
flavor: Like the witchers, Dorregaray is a monster aficionado, though he's developed his own classification system. Instead of dividing them into necrophages, ogroids and the like, he just thinks they're all wonderful.

name: Nivellen
ability: Deploy: Move all units on an enemy row to the other row.
ability_html: Deploy: Move all units on an enemy row to the other row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Lost? Well, go be lost somewhere else. Somewhere not on my property, that is. Point your left ear to the sun and keep walking, you'll hit the road soon enough. Well? What're you waiting for?

name: Stregobor
ability: Timer 2 (Ranged): Each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
ability_html: Timer 2 (Ranged): Each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: The witcher had met thieves that looked like town councilors, town councilors that looked like beggars and kings that looked like thieves. Stregobor, though, always looked exactly like the commonly accepted imagining of what a mage should look like.

name: Royal Decree
ability: Play a unit from your deck.
ability_html: Play a unit from your deck.
flavor: We, Foltest, by divine right King of Temeria, Prince of Sodden, Senior Protector of Brugge, etcetera, etcetera, do hereby decree the following…

name: Mandrake
ability: Reset a unit.
ability_html: Reset a unit.
flavor: There you all stand! With wonderment awake, doubting the plan and high-discovery. Some, as if grappled by the fell mandrake, some, by the black dog's devilry.

name: Crow's Eye
ability: Purify an allied unit and boost it by 4.
ability_html: Purify an allied unit and boost it by 4.
keyword_html: Purify: Remove all statuses.
flavor: A certain famous pirate once so loved this intoxicating herb, he earned the nickname 'Crow's Eye.' The theatrical version of his legend omits this, however, to the great consternation of pirate lore sticklers.

name: Vigo's Muzzle
ability: Lock an enemy unit with 6 or less power and Seize it.
ability_html: Lock an enemy unit with 6 or less power and Seize it.
keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
flavor: Never has there been a beast Fringilla Vigo could not tame.

name: Wolfsbane
ability: Set an enemy unit's power to 1.
ability_html: Set an enemy unit's power to 1.
flavor: Also known as 'the queen of poisons,' wolfsbane is used in many witcher Potions and alchemic brews.

name: Lambert: Swordmaster
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit and all copies of that unit on your opponent's side by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit and all copies of that unit on your opponent's side by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Go teach your grandma to suck eggs.

name: Eskel: Pathfinder
ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with a primary category that is not in your starting deck.
ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with a primary category that is not in your starting deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Heard you panting from three miles away. Just didn't wanna give up that vantage point.

name: Vesemir: Mentor
ability:
Deploy: Boost all Witchers you control by 1.
Adrenaline 4: Also boost all Witchers in your hand and deck.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost all Witchers you control by 1. Adrenaline 4: Also boost all Witchers in your hand and deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
flavor: Killing monsters is not something to be taken lightly. Ciri must understand that if she's to become one of us.

name: Chort
ability: No ability.
ability_html: No ability.
flavor: A member of the Bovine Defense Force. Semper fi!

name: Mahakam Ale
ability: Boost a unit by 5 and remove its Lock.
ability_html: Boost a unit by 5 and remove its Lock.
keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
flavor: Considered to be the dwarves' greatest contribution to world culture.

ability:
Deploy: Spawn 2 Cows to the right, then Spawn 2 Cows to the left of this unit.
Order: Spawn a Cow on this row.
Cooldown: 3
ability_html: Deploy: Spawn 2 Cows to the right, then Spawn 2 Cows to the left of this unit. Order: Spawn a Cow on this row. Cooldown: 3

flavor: The hero Toussaint needs, but not the one it deserves.

name: Tainted Ale
ability: Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2 and Infuse it with "Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage self by 1".
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2 and Infuse it with "Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage self by 1".

Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
flavor: That beer supposed to be green…?

name: Ale of the Ancestors
ability:
Resilience.
Zeal. Order: Boost a unit by 3 and Infuse it with "Whenever this unit is targeted by Mahakam Ale or Golden Froth, boost self by 2".
Cooldown: 2
ability_html: Resilience. Zeal. Order: Boost a unit by 3 and Infuse it with "Whenever this unit is targeted by Mahakam Ale or Golden Froth, boost self by 2". Cooldown: 2

Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: Boros, the legendary founder of Clan Fuchs, died after overindulging in this beverage - he passed out while reaching for his golden ring, which had fallen into a brook.

name: Geralt: Yrden
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Reset the power of all units on a row.
Adrenaline 2: Reset the power of all units on an allied row instead.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Reset the power of all units on a row. Adrenaline 2: Reset the power of all units on an allied row instead.

flavor: He lay down next to Adda's mummified remains, drawing the Yrden Sign on the inner side of her sarcophagus' lid.

name: Cow
ability: Doomed.
ability_html: Doomed.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: In Beauclair, everything is better: the wine is sweeter, the cows are bigger and all the ladies are above average.

name: Phoenix
ability:
Deploy: Gain Vitality (5).
At the start of the round, while in your graveyard, Banish self, then Spawn Phoenix Hatchling on a random allied row.
ability_html: Deploy: Gain Vitality (5). At the start of the round, while in your graveyard, Banish self, then Spawn Phoenix Hatchling on a random allied row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: What came first, the phoenix or the egg?

name: Bone Talisman
ability: Boost all allied units by 1.
ability_html: Boost all allied units by 1.
flavor: The simplest of objects sometimes possess the greatest power.

name: Saesenthessis: Blaze
ability:
Lineage.
While in hand, deck, or on the battlefield, whenever an enemy unit is destroyed or Banished during your turn, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Lineage. While in hand, deck, or on the battlefield, whenever an enemy unit is destroyed or Banished during your turn, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Lineage: At the start of the game, boost self by the number of Dragons in your starting deck. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.

name: Ciri: Nova
ability:
Deploy: If your starting deck does not have cards with a provision cost of 10 or more, gain Resilience, Shield, and Veil.
Ciri: Nova and Golden Nekker are excluded from this condition.

Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
flavor: Zireael possesses a great power she cannot control. She is a danger - to herself, to others. Until she learns to control it, she should remain isolated.

name: Shupe's Day Off
ability: If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
ability_html: If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
flavor: Shupe is known to have quite the imagination. What other troll would look at scraps of paper and see rocks?

name: Doppler
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Choose a unit in your hand, then boost self by the number of units in your hand with the same primary category.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by 1 for each unique primary category among units in your hand.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Choose a unit in your hand, then boost self by the number of units in your hand with the same primary category. Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by 1 for each unique primary category among units in your hand.

flavor: Humans despise dopplers so much, they feel mere execution does not suffice - so they tie any they catch to a stake, cover them in thick clay and bake them in a fire.

name: Sihil
ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Deathblow: Play a bronze card from your hand, then move Sihil back to your hand.
Initiative: Also increase the damage by 1 for the rest of the game. If the damage was 3, transform into Masterful Sihil instead.
ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Deathblow: Play a bronze card from your hand, then move Sihil back to your hand. Initiative: Also increase the damage by 1 for the rest of the game. If the damage was 3, transform into Masterful Sihil instead.

flavor: What's written on this blade? That a curse? No. An insult.

name: Bekker's Rockslide
ability: Damage a unit by 8.
ability_html: Damage a unit by 8.
flavor: All it takes is one pebble and we're all done for.

name: Glorious Hunt
ability: Destroy the unit with the highest base power.
ability_html: Destroy the unit with the highest base power.
flavor: By the gods' gonads, witcher, why'd you bring me this filth?! I want that beast's head! - that was a ploughin' figure of ploughin' speech!

name: Dragon's Dream
ability: Spawn Dragon's Dream on an enemy row for 3 turns.
ability_html: Spawn Dragon's Dream on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Dragon's Dream: At the start of the owner's turn, when timer expires, damage all units in this row by 3.
flavor: In Zerrikania, dragon worship dominates every aspect of daily life. Thus it comes as no surprise they name weapons in their honor.

name: Garrison
ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play a base copy of a bronze Soldier from your starting deck.

ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 4 and move it to the other row.
